dialogue.introduction: I'm Special-type Destroyer... Ayanami-class 'Ushio'. It would be nice to be dismissed soon...
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the 10th of the Ayanami-class, Ushio. I survived the Battle of Leyte Gulf and many other fierce battles. After that fateful day at Leyte, I fought on dutifully till the end of the war at Yokosuka. U-um...to all the enemy ships that that were sunk... I really wanted to spare you. Really!
dialogue.secretary3: Hiyaa! P-... please don't worry about me...
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral, um... Ushio, awaiting orders... Er, I wonder if I'm a being a hindrance...? Au...... Um, um!
dialogue.secretarymarried: I'll help everyone if I can!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, I adore... No, wait... respect you! Yes! Always!
dialogue.show_players_score: Maybe it's... a letter for the Admiral...
dialogue.equipment2: It would be good... if I could just be a bit more self confident... I think...
dialogue.equipment3: I'll help everyone if I can!
dialogue.expedition_selection: I'll help everyone if I can!
dialogue.resource_collection: I'll help everyone if I can!
dialogue.instant_repair: I'll help everyone if I can!
dialogue.development: I'll help everyone if I can!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Repair teams... erm... please take care of me...
dialogue.start_a_sortie: It's a sortie, isn't it... I have to do it!
dialogue.night_battle: You are not allowed to hurt my comrades!
dialogue.mvp: I... was helpful?.. Ah... don't stare, everybody... It's embarrassing...
dialogue.sunk: I wonder... Did Ushio... protect everyone...?
dialogue.christmas_2014: Christmas... such a wonderful thing! Admiral, thank you very much! It's wonderful!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Sorry.... Don't look this way so much....
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Ah. I might have gained a bit of weight, really. Akebono-chan, I will try and lose some weight.
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn's sweet potatoes are delicious, aren't they? Admiral, why don't we collect some dry leaves from the garden and bake some sweet potatoes later?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Akebono-chan, those clothes are for? I see, it's already December's cleaning season. Ushio will also help.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Admiral, here you are the Setsubun beans. Umm, the demon is....Should I volunteer? Eh, it's fine?
